 Part 5: Time Series Classiﬁcation . Provides a step-by-step series of tutorials for
working through a challenging time series classiﬁcation problem for predicting human
activity from accelerometer data using deep learning methods.
Each part targets a speciﬁc learning outcome, and so does each tutorial within each part.
This acts as a ﬁlter to ensure you are only focused on the things you need to know to get to a
